DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate , proof concept approach , outcome patient present acute ST-elevation myocardial infarction within 3 hour symptom onset either pre-hospital setting community hospital emergency room without PCI facility . Following randomisation strategy early tenecteplase additional antiplatelet antithrombin therapy follow catheterisation within 6-24 hour timely coronary intervention appropriate ( rescue coronary intervention require ) Group A compare primary PCI perform accord local standard Group B . The study exploratory nature examine medical question . The efficacy safety endpoint well mixed ( efficacy safety ) composite endpoint 30 day follow randomisation evaluate . All clinical endpoint main interest assess single composite endpoint evaluation trial objective . All statistical test exploratory nature base descriptive p-values formal statistical hypothesis generation .
DOC.brief_title: STREAM-Strategic Reperfusion ( With Tenecteplase Antithrombotic Treatment ) Early After Myocardial Infarction
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Age equal great 18 year 2 . Onset symptoms < 3 hour prior randomisation 3.12lead ECG indicative acute STEMI 4.Informed consent receive Exclusion criterion : Medical history , procedure , medication administration presence factor would general predispose bleed event and/or inability evaluate study primary endpoint
